title: Did Ecuador Give the U.S. Military Permission to Use Galápagos Island Airfield?
subtitle: Remarks made by Ecuador's defense minister prompted concern about the UNESCO World Heritage Site in June 2019.
author: Dan MacGuill
vclaim: In June 2019, Ecuador's government announced a plan for U.S. military aircraft to use the Galápagos Island of San Cristóbal for refueling.
